channel.title: Comments on: UKLUG Hands On Labs

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>For the people who keep trying to leave comment spam, please know, if you don't leave a real name, or you leave a link to a site which I don't like I will remove your comment. This is not a democracy!</p>
item.content:encoded: For the people who keep trying to leave comment spam, please know, if you don’t leave a real name, or you leave a link to a site which I don’t like I will remove your comment. This is not a democracy!
